text:
Divo is a city in southern Ivory Coast. It is a sub-prefecture of and the seat of Divo Department. It is also the seat of Lôh-Djiboua Region in Gôh-Djiboua District and a commune. In the 2014 census, the population of Divo was 179,455, making it the tenth-most populated city in the country.
The city is served by Divo Airport.
History.
Divo was the seat of the Sud-Bandama region from 1997 to 2011.
